channel.title: Sublime REPL on Philipp Schmalen

item.title: Python in Sublime Text 3 with Sublime REPL and Anaconda
item.description: A flexible, project-centered setup for data science Switch between projects with a keystroke and do not worry about switching build systems. Expedite your data science workflow with this project-centered setup. In this tutorial you will learn how to link Sublime Text 3 to an environment from Anaconda/Miniconda and execute Python with SublimeREPL. You might already have existing projects with different conda virtual environments - no worries. This setup can be easily applied to any project that you already have.
